name: Fractal Image File
summary: Graphics file format developed by MediaBin, who was acquired by Interwoven Systems; stores an image with fractals, which are smaller graphics that can be repeated within an image and resized without losing image quality; used for fill textures or other repeatable patterns; also used to create high-definition prints.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Adobe Photoshop with Genuine Fractals plug-in

macos.display_name: Adobe Photoshop with Genuine Fractals plug-in
